name: Virtualization Software Engineer
description:
We provide services and extensions to cover all aspects of application development related to Data Communication Product Line. The products developed by our team are widely used in all enterprise-level telecom projects at Huawei to help developers write better code and be more productive.

Our team is involved in the process of creating a simulation development platform based on QEMU to run applications for telecom products on ARM based Linux guest OS to avoid using real physical device for debugging and testing.

Job Responsibilities:

  • Develop services and components for simulation development platform
  • Contribute to the development and maintenance of QEMU
  • Profile, analyze and optimize the created simulator software
  • Set up the QEMU simulation environment on the x86 Windows 10 host to run the ARM64 multi-core device Linux virtual guest machine
  • Use technologies and special features such as accelerator and MTTCG to improve the running efficiency of the QEMU virtual guest machine
  • Collaborate with internal and external team members to solve complex issues

Skills and Qualifications:

  • Strong background in С/C++ development
  • Programming in Assembly for x86 and ARM
  • Knowledge of AArch64 architecture is a plus
  • Multithreaded programming
  • Knowledge of Linux system configuration
  • Experience in writing scripts
  • Network driver programming
  • Linux kernel module development
  • Knowledge of Linux KVM and Memory Management
  • Experience in developing simulators and emulators
  • Knowledge of QEMU product is a plus
  • Large-scale open source development
  • Experience in developing algorithms and working with complex data structures

Conditions:

  • Professional and career development opportunity
  • Commercial medical insurance
  • Modern office in the city center
  • Employment according to the Labor Code of the Russian Federation
